summary: Jess Aarons and new girl Leslie Burke create a world of their own and call it Terabithia and pretend to be the king and queen. They return to their magical kingdom every day after school.
cast: Annette O'Toole|Julian Coutts|Julie Beaulieu|Gloria Carlin|Tom Heaton|Peter Dvorsky|Darlene Bradley|Sharon Alexander|Jennifer Matichuk|Tyler Popp|Bridget Ryan|Asaph Fipke|Paul McGaffey|Cathy Wenschlag|Anthony Mandler|Josephine Stebbings|Jennifer Rozenhart|Michael Bittner|Kresse Wesling
title: Puente a Terabitia
